member.name: T:TheEcodes.EcodeInformation
member.summary: A class to get all the valid information of a particular E code.

member.name: M:TheEcodes.EcodeInformation.#ctor(TheEcodes.Ecode)
member.summary: Instantiates the class and gets all the required information of the E-code.
member.param: E-code whose information to be retrieved.

member.name: M:TheEcodes.EcodeInformation.ToString
member.summary: Returns the instance of this EcodeInformation.

member.name: P:TheEcodes.EcodeInformation.EquivalentName
member.summary: Gets the qualified name of the E-code or its associated information.

member.name: P:TheEcodes.EcodeInformation.AbstractInformation
member.summary: Gets the brief information of the E-code. Basically in terms of integrity.

member.name: P:TheEcodes.EcodeInformation.CodeIntegrity
member.summary: Returns the level of E-code, how accepted it is for consumption as an ingredient.

member.name: P:TheEcodes.EcodeInformation.AdvertName
member.summary: Returns the name of E-code that is actually presented on any food item.

member.name: T:TheEcodes.Integrity
member.summary: Indicates how much is the E-code to be concerned.

member.name: T:TheEcodes.HelperFunctions
member.summary: A class to give ease integrating the code the with the application UI.

member.name: M:TheEcodes.HelperFunctions.ConvertStringToEcode(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given string aliasing any E-code, to that respective Ecode enumeration value.
member.param: String having the valid metadata of E-code

member.name: M:TheEcodes.HelperFunctions.CheckForIntegrity(TheEcodes.Ecode)
member.summary: Returns the integrity of a particular E-code.

member.name: M:TheEcodes.HelperFunctions.EnumerateEcodesToList
member.summary: Retrieves all the E-codes in a list of string.
